Package src.controller

Class OrderManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.controller.OrderManager
  • public class OrderManager
extends java.lang.Object
    OrderManager is a controller class that acts as a "middleman" between the view classes - OrderView and the model classes - Order.

    Since:
    2022-04-06

    • Method Detail

      • createOrder

        public static java.lang.String createOrder​(java.lang.String roomId)
        Creates a new order for the customer of the room Id specified as the argument.

        Calls RoomManager to update room orders

        Parameters:
        roomId - Room Id of customer ordering
        Returns:
        Order Id of the new order

      • addOrderItem

        public static boolean addOrderItem​(java.lang.String name,
                                   java.lang.String orderId,
                                   int amount)
        Adds menu item of the specified quantity to the customer's order
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the menu item to be added
        orderId - Id of the order
        amount - Quantity of menu item to be added
        Returns:
        true if menu item is successfully added to the order. Otherwise, false if menu item fails to be added (order Id is invalid/ menu item name entered does not exist in menu database)

      • removeOrderItem

        public static boolean removeOrderItem​(java.lang.String name,
                                      java.lang.String orderId,
                                      int amount)
        Removes menu item of the specified quantity from the customer's order
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the menu item to be removed
        orderId - Id of the order
        amount - Quantity of menu item to be removed
        Returns:
        true if menu item is successfully removed from the order. Otherwise, false if menu item fails to be removed (order Id is invalid/ menu item name entered does not exist in order or menu database)

      • printOrderDetails

        public static void printOrderDetails​(java.lang.String orderId)
        Prints the order of the specified order Id
        Parameters:
        orderId - Order Id of the order

      • setRemarks

        public static void setRemarks​(java.lang.String remarks,
                              java.lang.String orderId)
        Sets the remarks for the order of the specified order Id
        Parameters:
        remarks - Remarks for the order
        orderId - Order Id of the order

      • updateStatus

        public static boolean updateStatus​(OrderStatus newOrderStatus,
                                   java.lang.String orderId)
        Update the status of the order of the specified order Id
        Parameters:
        newOrderStatus - New order status to be used to update the order status
        orderId - Order Id of the order
        Returns:
        true if updating of order is successfull. Otherwise, false if id updating of order fails (Order Id is not in database).

      • updateAllRoomOrderToDelivered

        public static boolean updateAllRoomOrderToDelivered​(java.lang.String roomId)
        Update all room order to delivered after the user has checked out

        Calls RoomManager to validate room id.

        Parameters:
        roomId - Id of the room
        Returns:
        true if update of room orders is successful. Otherwise, false if room id not found.

      • validateOrderId

        public static boolean validateOrderId​(java.lang.String orderId)
        Checks if order Id is in the database for validation
        Parameters:
        orderId - Order Id of the order
        Returns:
        true if order Id is found in the database. Otherwise, false if order Id is not found in database

      • printAllOrders

        public static void printAllOrders()
        Prints all the orders in the database

      • searchOrderByRoom

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Order> searchOrderByRoom​(java.lang.String roomId)
        Searches the orders made by customer residing in room of the specified room Id
        Parameters:
        roomId - Room Id of the customer's room
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Order object of all the orders made by that room.

      • calculateTotalOrderPrice

        public static double calculateTotalOrderPrice​(java.lang.String roomId)
        Method to calculate the total order price of a room
        Parameters:
        roomId - Id of the room to calculate
        Returns:
        total order price of the room.
